testGetNumLocationsActivity() - Method in class com.thewafflers.tests.ScoringTests
This tests the utility method that outputs the number of locations of an activity type is used Input = array of activity location instances and type of activity output = integer of how many locations of that type are used This is used when generating score so that using a mix of locations increases score Input space partititions: Ensure that it only counts locations of that activity type, therefore some tests will include irelevent actions used to check they arent counted towards the total Also ensure as determined that the amount of times differing locations are used does not effect output We decided simply that using different locations should increase score, not the spread of that use i.e.
